Excellent burger restaurant. The burgers are really, really good. Try the Fresca for instance a burger with pesto on it. Loved it. The prices of the burgers are between 9 and 12 Euros, however they come without any side dish so make sure to order some patatas bravas or nachos to your liking. The atmosphere in this restaurant is far from fast food, but also not a place where you would hang out the whole night. So it looks more like an upscale bistro with high tables and bar chairs.
